import{EMPLOYEE_SIGNIN_REQUEST,EMPLOYEE_SIGNIN_SUCCESS,EMPLOYEE_SIGNIN_FAIL,EMPLOYEE_SIGNUP_REQUEST,EMPLOYEE_SIGNUP_SUCCESS,EMPLOYEE_SIGNUP_FAIL,EMPLOYEE_VIEWEMPLOYEES_REQUEST,EMPLOYEE_VIEWEMPLOYEES_FAIL,EMPLOYEE_VIEWEMPLOYEES_SUCCESS,EMPLOYEE_DELETE_REQUEST,EMPLOYEE_DELETE_SUCCESS,EMPLOYEE_DELETE_FAIL,EMPLOYEE_UPDATE_REQUEST,EMPLOYEE_UPDATE_SUCCESS,EMPLOYEE_UPDATE_FAIL,EMPLOYEE_SIGNOUT,ADMIN_GET_ALL_CHARGES_FAIL,ADMIN_GET_ALL_CHARGES_REQUEST,ADMIN_GET_ALL_CHARGES_SUCCESS}from'../constants/employeeConstants';import axios from'axios';import{SPRINGURL}from'../constants/URLConstants';export var employeeSigninAction=function employeeSigninAction(email,password){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_SIGNIN_REQUEST});var header={headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}};var body={email:email,password:password};var url=SPRINGURL+'/user/login';axios.post(url,body,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_SIGNIN_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_SIGNIN_FAIL,payload:error});});};};export var employeeSignupAction=function employeeSignupAction(employee_details){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_SIGNUP_REQUEST});var header={headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}};var url=SPRINGURL+'/admin/register';axios.post(url,employee_details,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_SIGNUP_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_SIGNUP_FAIL,payload:error});});};};export var viewEmployeesAction=function viewEmployeesAction(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_VIEWEMPLOYEES_REQUEST});var header={headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}};var url=SPRINGURL+'/admin';axios.get(url,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_VIEWEMPLOYEES_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_VIEWEMPLOYEES_FAIL,payload:error});});};};export var employeeDeleteAction=function employeeDeleteAction(emp_id){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_DELETE_REQUEST});var header={headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}};var url=SPRINGURL+'/admin/delete/'+emp_id;axios.delete(url,header).then(function(dresponse){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_DELETE_SUCCESS,payload:dresponse});}).catch(function(derror){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_DELETE_FAIL,payload:derror});});};};export var employeeUpdateAction=function employeeUpdateAction(emp_id,emp_details){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_UPDATE_REQUEST});var header={headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}};var url=SPRINGURL+'/admin/update/'+emp_id;axios.put(url,emp_details,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_UPDATE_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_UPDATE_FAIL,payload:error});});};};export var employeeLogoutAction=function employeeLogoutAction(){return function(dispatch){sessionStorage.removeItem('emp_details');sessionStorage.removeItem('emp_id');sessionStorage.removeItem('isLoggedIn');sessionStorage.removeItem('patient_id');sessionStorage.removeItem('docId');dispatch({type:EMPLOYEE_SIGNOUT});document.location.href='/home';};};export var adminGetTotalChargesAction=function adminGetTotalChargesAction(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:ADMIN_GET_ALL_CHARGES_REQUEST});var header={headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}};var url=SPRINGURL+'/receptionist/totalCharges';axios.get(url,header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:ADMIN_GET_ALL_CHARGES_SUCCESS,payload:response});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:ADMIN_GET_ALL_CHARGES_FAIL,payload:error});});};};
